title: Cardiac protection of wogonin in mice with pulmonary fibrosis by regulating Sirt1/ Î³-H2AX pathway.
abstract: Clinical evidence suggests that pulmonary fibrosis (PF) and heart failure (HF) often co-exist; however, the specific impact of PF on HF remains underexplored. This gap in understanding complicates the management and treatment of HF in patients with PF.
